TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_ayang, title = ayang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/ayang} }

S.FORM: ciriq qsinu qu kinbkaysan na 'tayal sraral hiya ga, mutux naha si p'yangi, 'magan cikay tana' ini'ga maqaw ga, blaq balay nbun qu ayang nya.
ciriq qsino qo kinbkaysan na 'tayal sraral hiya ga, motox naha si p'yangi, 'magan cikay tana' ini'ga maqaw ga, blaq balay nbon qo ayang nya.
